website_summaries.verdict: A nice reliable rice cooker with no frills, but includes a removable inner which can go in the dishwasher.
pros: Easy one-button push for steaming rice
Can make a large amount of rice (16 cups)
Automatically shifts from cook to warm when rice is done cooking
Glass lid completely removes and is dishwasher safe
Allows you to steam veggies and cook rice at the same time
cons: This model does not have extra modes for soup or other grains

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooker!
customer_reviews.text: The rice cooker is excellent, if you know how to cook. (Never overfill any rice cooker/steamer for it to leak) One cup rice and 2 cups of water, with a teaspoon of olive oil. It helps to ensure the rice doesnt stick as well. When cooking is finished, unplug it and let it steam. The warm feature will still cook your finished rice making it overcooked. As a caterer/chef, it has my approval.
customer_reviews.author: Pickybuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not messy if you use the steam basket
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this rice cooker. It’s true it can be messy if you don't use the steamer basket in it. But if you do put the steamer basket in it while your cooking rice there is no mess at all. I've steamed frozen vegetables in it and at the same time added meat on top of that and it seems to cook everything in there perfect, and its all ready at the same time. I have cooked fish, shrimp, and even chicken in it. I couldnt be happier with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Cretin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through exactly four rice cookers now and I’ve got to say, this is the best one I’ve ever had. A lot of rice cookers have issues with spitting water while it’s cooking but if you put the white steam container in this one while it’s cooking, it stops it from spitting water. Also, some rice cookers will burn the rice to the bottom of the pot *cough* Aroma *cough* which makes it super hard to clean them, but this rice cooker doesn’t leave any burnt rice at the bottom of the pot. Overall it’s a great rice cooker and the only one I can recommend
customer_reviews.author: Derek Williams

customer_reviews.title: Messy.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it does what it’s supposed to do. It cooks rice. It comes with a measuring cup and a white rice spoon. The thing I didn’t expect was what a huge mess it would make. I mean super messy. By the photo I’ve provided, you can’t really tell against my white countertops but you can see on the rim of the pot itself, the lining of my mini fridge door and on the floor all the splatter marks it leaves behind. Not the exactly ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Norma C.

customer_reviews.title: Conked out in a week
customer_reviews.text: The cooker functioned as advertised for about a week. Then it simply stopped working, as if no power was being provided to the unit. I initiated a return but missed UPS pickup as I have to work on weekdays and there was nobody home. A complete waste of money. The product is poorly constructed and highly unreliable. I suggest you invest a little more and buy a programmable pot / pressure cooker instead. That's what I had to do.
customer_reviews.author: Harish

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves this. She said she wanted a rice cooker, but she makes meals in this and they’re wonderful. Rice does not stick, is done every time, and really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie12

customer_reviews.title: Messy but makes good rice
customer_reviews.text: Makes great rice but makes a mess on your counter. I have to put a towel under the cooker to protect my butcher block counter from the steam that is released during cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Howig

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rice cooker since my 3 year old daughter is more used to having rice dishes and I was missing doing Puertorican recipes. First thing I did in this cooker was medium grain yellow rice mixed with vienna sausages and it came out just like my mom would make it. The medium grain was not undercooked and adding other ingredients into the rice didn't affect it. I look forward to trying other recipes like yellow rice mixed with cod "arroz con bacalao" and it comes with a basket so I shall give it a try with a piece of boneless poultry or maybe seafood.
customer_reviews.author: Jun_Kinako

customer_reviews.title: Skip Hamilton beach rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rice cooker for our growing family, have had my 3 qt black and decker for many years. Yesterday (4 months from the date of purchase) this rice cooker simply conked out. I just checked the warranty and Hamilton beach said they can repair or replace but the cost to send it to them is on me. I wouldn’t recommend this product, it stopped working after 4 months and the warranty is useless. BTW my 3 qt black and decker is almost 9 YEARS old without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: NYMama

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen helper ever.
customer_reviews.text: Rice cookers are amazing. This is my 3rd one during my 45 years on this planet. Put in the rice, add the water and turn it on. I do wish it had a bell when it was done though. I get creative after step 1 and two. A little canola or coconut oil, tomato whole in the middle, chicken seasoning cubes, salt. You can even put your frozen veggies on the steamer to cook. Once its done it's easy to add stir fry sauce, teriyaki and eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: The best for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love our new rice cooker it’s easy, fast and the rice just taste better than in a common pot . Maybe spit some water when is cooking the rice but probably you will handle this little issue. If you have somebody in home like my husband . You will probably teach him in two seconds how help you with the rice :)
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooker for once moth and two days. (figures it would die two days after warranty) My previous Hamilton Beach Rice Cooker lasted 6 years but was broken in our move. When I received this one, I could tell is was half the quality of the original one. Very cheaply made. I've used it less than a dozen times and today it started smoking and smelled like an electrical fire. It's just junk. I would highly recommend using any other manufacturer because it appears that Hamilton Beach values profits over quality; at least that's my opinion of this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: George Blasing

customer_reviews.title: burns rice at the bottom if you leave it in there
customer_reviews.text: I am half korean and rice is a must for me. I needed something quick. The first one shorted on me, contacted Amazon, they replaced it, sent ups to pick up the return item! I love amazon. We eventually bought another more pricier rice steamer but we had to do research before purchasing that one. Definitely keeping this one, though, it steams food!
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price :(
customer_reviews.text: The rice is not cooked evenly, one side is undercooked while the other is overcooked. You can't leave it on to keep warm otherwise the bottom on the rice hardens, unlike our old rice cooker where it can be left one overnight. Well you get what you paid for i guess, since this is a $20.00 rice cooker, I didn't expect much but still I didn't think it'll be this horrible.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: A wonderul cooker with a teflon inside
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-looking rice cooker which is easy to use. It has a Teflon inside so the food does not stick to the inner pot. I use if for rice and also to steam vegetables. After the cooking cycle is finished it stays warm. It was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: Yesss
customer_reviews.text: Finally i can cook rice!!!! I am the worst at cooking rice. And now i finally mastered it. The i structions arent super clear. But add the water AFTER the rice is in the cooker. Idid the other way and my first batch was too wet. 2nd time perfected it. Love this cooker!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Beau

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: The rice maker didn’t work when I received it. It was a hassle trying to return it. Not worth the money. Keep searching and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kayti Schroff

customer_reviews.title: Broke during third use
customer_reviews.text: Just tried to use it for the third time and it died during use. wont turn on and I tried different outlets. Spend more for a better quality rice cooker. I went cheap and it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: lauren kinslow

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to replace in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a year ago right after my previous rice cooker by Hamilton Beach died. Well this one just died on me today. I thought maybe something happened to my other one and it shorted out or something, no they just randomly die mid cooking.. not real impressed right now and quite annoyed because everything else got done cooking and I thought my rice just needed a few more minutes, but no it had hardly started to cook before it died out. This is exactly how my first one died as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Rice cooker works as advertised. I wanted a black one to go with my kitchen décor. I just wish they had it in a slightly bigger size. Rice cooks well, but it's important to stir it right when finishes, or the rice on the bottom gets a little crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, doesn’t cook well
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker sucks! It doesn’t cook the rice properly, leaving it hard and un-done. Have used it several times now and have had no rice turn out good or cooked. Wish o. Oils return it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker stopped working the second week I had it...would warm up, then click off before cooking the rice...worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Headrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly made rice
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is big and makes plenty of rice. Nice steamer tray for vegetables. I’ve been using rice cookers forever and this one makes the rice perfect every time. Be sure to use the enclosed spoon and follow the measurements. Very easy to clean. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stamos

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great size for large family, very versatile and use daily to cook all my side dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Viola2u

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Rice every time
customer_reviews.text: No matter what we do, the rice ends up crunchy. The bottom layer gets over cooked unless you unplug it at some miraculous time. Never had this problem with a previous rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: GM-Seattle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it cooks perfect rice every time. For best results, it can cook 1 to 3 8oz cup of uncooked rice. Or even 4 cups of uncooked rice.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: A "must have" rice maker
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is aesthetically appealing as well as easy to clean with no hidden crevasses. We cook rice for dinner at least five days a week and have had no problems with it our family highly approves of this rice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin&Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Fine rice cooker for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Add a tiny bit extra water if you rinse well and put a cookie sheet under it if you make 16 cups ( to catch the tiny bit that shoots through the vent hole)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooking rice
customer_reviews.text: Cooks quoina fine but not rice. Lets steam blow all over the top and on surrounding area. Have used it several times for rice, will not again. Do not let rice or quoina set on warm cycle, it sticks and dries out .
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick pot of rice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to start teaching my sons to find their way around the kitchen. It’s simple to use and easy to clean. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a wedding rehearsal dinner. I already had two rice cookers and needed another. This produced more capacity than my others. Worked wonderfully. Very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: what we needed
customer_reviews.text: thumbs up! been using this for couple of months now. we eat rice every day so we always use this and I could definitely say that is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JLei03

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, but maybe a bit too simple

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make a multi grain dish. It operates fine, and is easy to clean. Great for any rice or grain dish you want to cook.

customer_reviews.title: No rice for us. :(
customer_reviews.text: This died on us multiple times, then it would miraculously work, then finally gave up forever. It’s just a rice cooker, so I’m disappointed it didn’t last very long!

customer_reviews.title: good

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Well is a rice cooker and you know how use! Is working well and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this item. Been 3 months. Pretty and it does the job

customer_reviews.title: no matter what you do the rice clumps up and sticks to bottom. a real pain to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: rice sticks and burns . much easier to do it in a regular pot

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it months ago, and it is still working

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. She loves it. Put chicken breast in tray. Said it made them juicy & flavored rice at the same time. Made extra rice & froze it. Large capacity.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and quick. Easy to clean. I love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use. First Hamilton Beach rice cooker i have owned. Do hope it’s durable.

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising (only 8 cups)
customer_reviews.text: False marketing!!! It is NOT a 16 cup rice cooker like the product description and box state. I purchased this to replace a 16 cup rice cooker and it is much smaller. Plus, the insert only goes up to “8” cups. The included booklet even states on page 13 “One rice measuring cup equals 6 oz or approximately 3/4 cup U.S. measure,”

customer_reviews.text: I had this rice cooker set aside for a while and had never even opened its box. A week ago I tried it for the first time. I noticed it took a long time to cook a small amount of rice. Next day I try it again and guess what? it would not even turn on... Really disappointing and frustrating.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Rice Cooker & Food Steamer, 16 Cups Cooked (8 Uncooked), With Steam & Rinse Basket, Black (37517)
product_meta.description: Making rice and whole grains in the Hamilton Beach Electric Rice Cooker & Food Steamer is as easy as placing the ingredients in the nonstick bowl and turning it on. The rice will cook perfectly on its own, giving you time to prepare the rest of your meal. There’s no need to worry about boiling water, adjusting the temperature or even setting a timer - it will automatically shift to warm once the cook cycle is complete. And with a 16 Cup cooked rice Capacity, you’ll have enough to feed a crowd. Use the included 2-in-1 basket to rinse rice or grains ahead of cooking, or use it to steam everything from salmon to zucchini. Clean up is a snap with the dishwasher safe nonstick cooking bowl and rice rinser/steam basket. The lid liner can also be removed for quick cleaning.
feature_bullets: Cook rice, whole grains, hot cereal, steamed vegetables & much more
16 cup cooked rice capacity, 8 cup uncooked
Included rice rinser doubles as a steam basket
Automatically cooks rice, then shifts to warm
Steam food while rice cooks below

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars867 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
